definition: fig. high in the clouds/(in the) cloud (computing)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: We fly together, leapt to the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 我們攜手展翅高飛，躍上雲端。

sentences.english: You could always farm outspecific parts of your site to the cloud.
sentences.chinese: 你不能總將網站的特定部分寄放在雲端。

sentences.english: His company was the largest tenant in the Trade Center, a village nestled in the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司是世貿最大的房客，就象依偎在雲端的村莊。

sentences.english: From the cloud. Like we’ve always dreamed.
sentences.chinese: 就像我們一直夢想的，仿若置身雲端。

sentences.english: Also, cloud-based BPM modeling facilitates collaboration between process contributors.
sentences.chinese: 還有，雲端的BPM建模也促進了流程參與者的協作。

sentences.english: The rocket ascended into the cloud.
Lightning arcs from the top of a cloud to the horizon off the coast of the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 來自雲端的閃電弧擊中巴哈馬海岸外的地平線。

sentences.english: It doesn’t want or need everything to happen in the cloud.
sentences.chinese: 它不希望或者不需要一切事情都發生在雲端。

sentences.english: The new Quick Scan uses in-the-cloud technology for better detection and improved response time to new and unknown viruses.
sentences.chinese: 大致上是說有應用到雲技術以及改善雲端的響應時間。

sentences.english: And suspected YaoTai mirror, fly in the wan side.
sentences.chinese: 又疑瑤臺鏡，飛在青雲端。

sentences.english: Panel (c) Cloud-top pressure for all clouds in the image./
sentences.chinese: c組表示圖片中的雲端氣壓圖。

sentences.english: Have a mansion high above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 在高高的雲端上擁有一棟華廈。

sentences.english: Though human eyes perceive the opposite, lightning moves from the ground up to the cloud.
sentences.chinese: 人類眼睛看到的正相反，彷彿閃電從地面向雲端運動。

sentences.english: The cloud-connected mobile device is the next major computing era.
sentences.chinese: 連接雲端的移動設備是下一個計算時代的主流。

sentences.english: A key element of cloud computing is customization and the creation of a user-defined experience.
sentences.chinese: 雲端運算的關鍵在於個人化與創造使用者的個人體驗。

sentences.english: You mean to tell me you've never been up there doing a little cloud-seeding?
sentences.chinese: 你不要告我你從未做過雲端撒種這種事？

definition: hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
